channel.title: Making server run for everyone? Help?
channel.description: I have windows 7 and i compiled my server with JDK 7 the newest one and made my own web client all worked fine untill that i found out that if you dont have JDK 7 you cant run it. So I down graded to JDk 6 update 31 and it worked fine but now you need JDK 6 update 31 to play it. So my question is how can I make it where any one can play even if they dont have jdk because it is a pain to get people to play.

item.title: Making server run for everyone? Help?
item.dc:creator: @tycooley tycooley
item.description:
@tycooley wrote:

No they needed JDK to play because if they didn’t they get a error then I tell them what jdk what to get and right when they get it they can play.

Read full topic
item.source: Making server run for everyone? Help?

item.title: Making server run for everyone? Help?

&&
They don’t need JDK to play only JRE
